messages.subject: RE:New Welcome Message
messages.msgSnippet: Perhaps the new message should tell people what the moderators do, that is, you don t censor, but are there to referee or whatever you d like to call it! :-)
messages.messageBody:
Perhaps the new message should tell people what the moderators do, that is,
you don't censor, but are there to referee or whatever you'd like to call
it! :-) Another list I'm on had a message from the moderator today that said
a discussion seemed to be going in a direction other than homeschooling and
she had pulled the messages and was asking the participants to take it
offline. I would have been extremely annoyed had I been one of those
posters, and would not want to post on a list that heavily moderated.

Karen
